thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com | 282 3
thread.title: Gregory Chow
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Gregory Chow

author: Gregory Chow
title: Gregory Chow
text: I have ordered many products from Banggood. They all came in good time and have functioned well. For the times I had a problem with a product, Banggood customer service was more than happy to help me find a solution to solve the issue or send a replacement free of charge hassle free. Banggod stands behind their products 100%
